5.00 from 1 vote

Created: Aug. 28th, 2009

All of these books hold a special place in my hear

Tags:Books

 

  • The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn by Mark Twain

    One of my all time favourites!

  • The Secret History by Donna Tartt

    Academic intrigue bringing dark ancient rituals into the modern day.

  • The Time Traveler's Wife by Audrey Niffenegger

    A romantic tale, and a mind trip over theoretical time mechanics with lovable characters and complex emotions.

  • The Lovely Bones by Alice Sebold

    Sebold has written a beautiful novel about a horrifying topic, bringing together love, family, growing up and eternity together for an wonderful experience. Looking forward to the Peter Jackson adaptation coming out in Winter 2009.
